about_the_game:
The game is divided into two processes, 10 minutes before the development stage, 10 minutes after the challenge stage, only the hunter who survived the challenge stage can take away the treasure

A wide variety of weapons

Weapons in the game are divided into basic/melee/range/missiles/projectiles and other weapon types, and the difference between physical and magic properties, is also divided into savage/blood/lightning and other genres, you can choose more different types of weapons, with their own attack methods.

Enhance your weapon for special effects

Upgrades can obtain strengthening points to strengthen weapons, and there is a probability of obtaining weapon effects, forming the key to construction. Depending on the special effects, choose more suitable skills and treasures. Some weapons have effects that can interact with other weapons, some can enhance the weapon itself based on attributes, and some can increase character attributes.

Example: Savage Hammer - One of the weapon effects: The maximum health can be added to the damage and scope of the weapon

Upgrade to unlock featured skills

You gain skills when your weapon reaches a certain level. A type of skill that enhances one type of weapon, a type of growth skill that continuously increases its stat, and a type of skill that gains another stat based on one stat.

Find treasure chests to fight enemies

Find treasure chests scattered around the map surrounded by monsters, different treasure chests have different treasures, the more precious treasure chests need to open longer. Fight against increasingly powerful enemies with treasures and weapons in the chest, and only the last hunter alive will be able to take his unique treasure.

name: Mystic Explorer

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows® 10 64-bit / Windows® 11 64-bit
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen™ 3 1200 / Intel® Core™ i3-6100
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon HD 7790, 2 GB / GeForce GTX 750Ti, 2 GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows® 10 64-bit / Windows® 11 64-bit
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen™ 3 1200 / Intel® Core™ i5-6500
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon™ RX 480 / NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 1060 (3GB)
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: Mystic Explorer is a treasure rogue game. Players will play the role of treasure hunter in search of treasure chests in the siege of monsters, defeat the ever stronger enemies, and bring back your own archive treasures.
